'''The Bitter Fruit of Dreams''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to successfully use the [["Kusava"]] gadget during the world quest ''[[Agnihotra Sutra]]''.
